"Finiteemption" - a feeling of satisfaction and relief when you finally complete a challenging task, as if you've reached the finish line after a long race.
"Taskenvy" - a feeling of admiration and jealousy towards someone who effortlessly completes tasks and projects, as if they have a superpower.
"Procrastinemia" - a condition where you feel overwhelmed by the sheer volume of tasks you need to complete, causing you to procrastinate and put things off until the last minute.
"Task-tivity" - a feeling of excitement and motivation when you start a new task, as if you're about to embark on an adventure.
